group_1.textRight: The moment when impurities accumulate in@Soul Gems and turn them into Grief Seeds

group_1.textLeft: I don't remember hearing about that at the time@of making the contract.

group_1.textRight: That's because you didn't ask me.@Was there a problem?

group_1.textLeft: What are you talking about?!@It's a crucial problem!
The way they looked...@It's as if they weren't alive...!

group_1.textRight: You humans continue to expand in numbers@without perishing.
The life and death of an individual seem to@be irrelevant.

group_1.textLeft: In our world, the life and death of an individual@is held in the highest esteem.
Failure to inform contractors of the serious risks@is no different from a scam...

group_1.textRight: It's fair compensation for granting a wish you@never could have achieved on your own.
I don't think I would call it a scam.

group_1.textLeft: You don't get to decide what that compensation@is worth.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry. I did it before we were able to hear@what he'd say...

group_1.textLeft: No, Miura. If you hadn't killed him, I would have.
What... You were watching us just now...?

group_1.textRight: They helped me, and I thought it would be bad@to run away...
Um... I saw something strange from the two@who helped me...

group_1.textLeft: The existence known as Magical Girls, those@beings you were offered a contract to become,
are a marvel you encountered, protecting the@world by battling Witches.
But the ultimate fate in the end, as we have@just seen, is to become a Witch yourself.
It's better to just forget about it all, with the only@lesson being not to become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: What you saw today was an illusion...

group_1.textLeft: It's a dream...an illusion...@So, please forget it...
I think it's better for yourself if you pretend it@never happened...

group_1.textRight: The bodies feel soulless, no warmth left behind...
...After all, these Soul Gems are our lives now.

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to believe it...but this is reality, right...?

group_1.narration: We are no different from prey@oblivious to the presence of a trap.
Running blindly through fields and mountains,@only to be ensnared in a trap and awaken to the truth...
The stark reality that your life is in@the hands of something unseen.
